com.github.kvnxiao.kommandant

Interface ICommandBank

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CommandBank

    public ICommandBank

    An interface that defines the methods a command registry needs.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean addCommand(ICommand<?> command)
      Adds a command to the registry.
      boolean changePrefix(ICommand<?> command, java.lang.String newPrefix)
      Change an existing command's prefix.
      void clearAll()
      Deletes all commands from the registry.
      boolean deleteCommand(ICommand<?> command)
      Deletes a command from the registry and destroys all subcommand references.
      ICommand<?> getCommand(java.lang.String singleString)
      Gets a command from the bank by providing a single string (usually the "prefix + alias" together)
      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,com.github.kvnxiao.kommandant.command.ICommand> getCommands()
      Gets an immutable map of all single-string identifiers to commands (usually all "prefix + alias" strings to commands)
      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,com.github.kvnxiao.kommandant.command.ICommand> getCommandsForPrefix(java.lang.String prefix)
      Gets an immutable map of alias to commands for the given prefix.
      java.util.List<com.github.kvnxiao.kommandant.command.ICommand> getCommandsUnique()
      Gets an immutable list of all commands
      java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getPrefixes()
      Gets an immutable set of all prefixes registered in the bank.
      boolean removeCommand(ICommand<?> command)
      Removes a command from the registry, but does not destroy it.

    • Method Detail

      • addCommand

        boolean addCommand(ICommand<?> command)

        Adds a command to the registry.

        Returns:
        Boolean Whether the command was successfully added to the registry.

      • removeCommand

        boolean removeCommand(ICommand<?> command)

        Removes a command from the registry, but does not destroy it.

        Returns:
        Boolean Whether the command was successfully removed from the bank.

      • deleteCommand

        boolean deleteCommand(ICommand<?> command)

        Deletes a command from the registry and destroys all subcommand references.

        Returns:
        Boolean Whether the command and all its subcommands were successfully deleted.

      • getCommand

        ICommand<?> getCommand(java.lang.String singleString)

        Gets a command from the bank by providing a single string (usually the "prefix + alias" together)

        Returns:
        class ICommand The (nullable) command.

      • changePrefix

        boolean changePrefix(ICommand<?> command,
                     java.lang.String newPrefix)

        Change an existing command's prefix.

        Returns:
        Boolean Whether the prefix change was successful.

      • getPrefixes

        java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getPrefixes()

        Gets an immutable set of all prefixes registered in the bank.

        Returns:
        Set The set of all prefixes.

      • getCommands

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,com.github.kvnxiao.kommandant.command.ICommand> getCommands()

        Gets an immutable map of all single-string identifiers to commands (usually all "prefix + alias" strings to commands)

        Returns:
        ImmutableCommandMap The immutable map of all single-string identifiers to commands.

      • getCommandsUnique

        java.util.List<com.github.kvnxiao.kommandant.command.ICommand> getCommandsUnique()

        Gets an immutable list of all commands

        Returns:
        List The immutable list of all registered commands.

      • getCommandsForPrefix

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,com.github.kvnxiao.kommandant.command.ICommand> getCommandsForPrefix(java.lang.String prefix)

        Gets an immutable map of alias to commands for the given prefix.

        Returns:
        ImmutableCommandMap The immutable map of all aliases to commands under the given prefix.

      • clearAll

        void clearAll()

        Deletes all commands from the registry.
